新颖的AI增强乳腺X线照片中的乳腺癌检测MASAI试验显示，乳房X线摄影中的AI可将癌症检测增加29％，并使放射科医生的工作量减少44％，从而确保诊断可靠性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250206/novel-ai-boosts-breasts-breasts-cancer-detection-inmammagrams.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250206/novel-ai-boosts-breasts-breast-cancer-detection-inmammagrams.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f98296ac-dcbf-480d-b0e7-7080440b8994 Thu, 06 Feb 2025 04:54:00 -0500 Novel AI boosts breast cancer detection in mammograms
